articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un visited the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Thursday, the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, and paid homage to the fallen fighters of the People's Army.
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Ri Myong Su, Pak Yong Sik and other commanding officers of the Korean People's Army and those of all the services and corps-level units.
					
					 The Supreme Leader arrived at the Cemetery and a wreath was laid in his name.
					
					 He, together with the participants, paid silent tribute to the memory of the fallen fighters of the People's Army and went round the cemetery.
					
					 He expressed belief that all the servicepersons, party members, working people and rising generations would keep the noble spirit of defending the country and mass heroism displayed by the heroic soldiers in the 1950s as the most precious ideological and mental treasure in the drive for prosperity of the country and the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, and carry them forward from generation to generation.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Syrian Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Syrian Delegation
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Syria Baath Children Organization.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by Waddah Sawas, director of the Technology, Information and External Relations Department who is heading the visiting delegation of the Syria Baath Children Organization, on Friday.

articles.title: President of DPRK SPA Presidium Soon to Visit Iran
articles.content:
President of DPRK SPA Presidium Soon to Visit Iran
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, will soon visit Iran to attend the Iranian presidential inauguration at the invitation of the Iranian government.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Slams Remarks of Special Rapporteur of UNHRC
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Slams Remarks of Special Rapporteur of UNHRC
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA on July 28 as regards the fact that recently, the special rapporteur of the United Nations Human Rights Council (UNHRC) on the situation of human rights in Myanmar criticized the Myanmar government in unison with the U.S.
					 Recently, the UNHRC special rapporteur on the situation of human rights in Myanmar is tightening pressure upon it, aligning herself with the sanctions and pressure racket of the U.S. against Myanmar while politicizing "the human rights issue" of the Rohingya, the inhabitants of Rakhine state.
					
					 At a press conference held on July 21 after her visit to Myanmar, she sharply criticized the human rights situation of Rohingya, far from the reality without mentioning a single word about positive measures taken by the Myanmar government. 
					
					 Her criticism came around the same time the U.S. representative to UN made an open interference in the internal affairs of Myanmar on July 11 by saying that the incidents happening in Myanmar cannot be overlooked and that the Myanmar government should receive the investigation team of UNHRC and therefore, is triggering the due backlash from the Myanmar government.
					
					 Her remarks betray that she is following the U.S. in its schemes to interfere in the internal affairs of other countries under the pretext of "human rights protection", in violation of the principles of impartiality and noninterference in the internal affairs to be kept to in addressing human rights issues.
					
					 This is another clear example which shows that the mechanism of special rapporteurs on human rights situation of individual countries, which makes it as its business to interfere in internal affairs of specific countries under the direction of the U.S., does only harm and that the international human rights organizations are kowtowing to the U.S. and playing the role as its puppets.
					
					 The international human rights organizations should not collaborate with the malicious moves of the U.S. to put pressure on independent countries under the cloak of "human rights judge", but exert every effort to respect the sovereignty and interests of sovereign states and to realize genuine international justice.
					
					 The DPRK government categorically rejects the interference of international human rights organizations including the UNHRC in internal affairs of sovereign states and will actively support and encourage the just cause of the government and people of Myanmar in building a peaceful and democratic federal state.

articles.title: DPRK FM Delegation Visits Philippines
articles.content:
DPRK FM Delegation Visits Philippines
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK led by Vice Minister Choe Hui Chol visited the Republic of Philippines on July 26.
					 During his visit Choe Hui Chol had talks with Enrique Gonzales Manalo, undersecretary for Policy, Department of Foreign Affairs of the Philippines.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged opinions on the issue of developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries as required by the present situation and regional and international issues of mutual concern.
					
					 The DPRK side referred to the validity of its steps for bolstering up military capabilities for self-defence and successes in the building of a socialist power, expressing the stand to expand and develop the relations with the Philippines in different fields.
					
					 The Philippines side said the delegation's visit would mark a significant occasion in further developing the bilateral relations and underlined the importance for boosting support and cooperation among the member nations of the ASEAN Regional Forum including the DPRK.

articles.title: Jon Yong Nam Meets Syrian Delegation
articles.content:
Jon Yong Nam Meets Syrian Delegation
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, had a talk with the delegation of the Syria Baath Children Organization led by Waddah Sawas, director of the Technology, Information and External Relations Department, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Visits Statues of Great Leaders
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Visits Statues of Great Leaders
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here on Friday.
					 The delegation laid a bouquet at the statues of the great leaders and paid homage to them.

articles.title: Art Performance Given to Celebrate War Victory Day
articles.content:
Art Performance Given to Celebrate War Victory Day
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given here on Thursday, the 64th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 It was enjoyed by Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senor officials of the Party, state and army, officials of the Party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, war veterans and labor innovators in Pyongyang.
					
					 The artistes of the Chongbong Band, the State Merited Chorus and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe newly created eternal odes to the war victory, the songs for advance of socialism and put them on the stage.
					
					 The performance began with prelude "July 27, Our Victory Day". Put on the stage were orchestra and serial songs "All Efforts for Victory of War", female chorus famous masterpiece "Song of Best Wishes", tap dance "At the Spring Site", male duet and chorus "Echo of War Victory" and other colorful numbers. 
					
					 The performers highly praised President Kim Il Sung for creating the unprecedented military miracle of defeating the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 Among the numbers are ones which depicted the brave soldiers of the heroic People's Army who devoted themselves to opening up the route of charges for advance and the people in the rear who conducted dynamic activities for aiding the front.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers showing the heroic spirit of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are demonstrating the might of the nuclear power of Juche, possessor of the strongest ICBM, while winning one victory after another in the confrontation with the U.S. which has lasted century after century.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Samjiyon Band Gives Performance in Hamhung
articles.content:
Samjiyon Band Gives Performance in Hamhung
Hamhung, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe gave performances in Hamhung City from July 12 to 28.
					 Its numbers included serial songs of guerrillas, instrumental music and song "We Always Think of Marshal", female quartet "We Cannot Live without You" and female solo "Big Fish Haul".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who has displayed the independent dignity and invincible might of the DPRK all over the world through his painstaking efforts.
					
					 There were also numbers representing the Korean army and people's will to achieve the final victory in building a socialist power.
					
					 Among the audience were provincial officials and war veterans.
					
					 The band also gave congratulatory performances at the February 8 Vinalon Complex, the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and the Tonghungsan Garment Factory.

articles.title: Youngsters' Football Tournaments Held
articles.content:
Youngsters' Football Tournaments Held
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The 11th National Football Tournament of Primary School Football Classes and the 7th National Tournaments of Junior and Senior Middle School Football Classes took place here from July 18 to 28.
					About 1,200 players selected in provinces played at the tournaments.
					
					 Players from the Raknang Primary School of Raknang District and the Kwangbok Primary School of Mangyongdae District of Pyongyang took the first places respectively in the boy and girl matches.
					
					 Those from the Kwangbok Junior Middle School of Mangyongdae District and the Sangsin Junior Middle School of Sosong District respectively won the boy and girl matches.
					
					 Those from the Kaeson Senior Middle School of Moranbong District and the Namsin Senior Middle School of Songyo District respectively came first in the boy and girl matches.

articles.title: Nampho Fishery Station Fulfills Yearly Plan
articles.content:
Nampho Fishery Station Fulfills Yearly Plan
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Fishery Stations in the west coastal area of the DPRK are making good results in fishing.
					 Typical of them is the Nampho Fishery Station which has caught scores tons of fish every day and thus overfulfilled its yearly plan.
					
					 In this regard, Kang Kyong Su, manager of the station, told KCNA:
					
					 Recently, the station has introduced rational methods into fishing and put shoal detection on a scientific basis, so as to catch three times more fish, as compared with the same period of last year.
					
					 In particular, girl fishers of the fishing vessel honored with the title of "Daughter of the Workers' Party of Korea-Young Heroine" raised the fish catch per netting by remodeling fishing tackles and improving fishing methods.

articles.title: Cage-net Fish Farming Active in Jagang Province of DPRK
articles.content:
Cage-net Fish Farming Active in Jagang Province of DPRK
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Jagang Province of the DPRK is taking the lead in cage-net fish farming, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy on bettering the citizen's diet by breeding fishes on a large scale across the country.
					 Now, the province encourages all its cities and counties to model cage-net fish farms after those built in dams of cascade power stations along the Chongchon River and some cities and counties, including Kanggye City.
					
					 On the basis of detailed investigation into different areas of the Amnok River, the province has set up mobile cage-net fish farms in its deep waters with slow current.
					
					 In case of Usi County alone, it built a cage-net fish farm covering an area of 150 square meters in the river and is breeding various species of fishes, including young perches.
					
					 Jasong and Wiwon counties also set up mobile cage-net fish farms in eleven sites and have introduced scientific breeding method.
					
					 Now, cage-net fish farms built along the River Amnok teem with perch, Ryongjong fish, carp, mandarin fish, catfish and other tasty and highly productive fishes.

articles.title: 15th National Invention and New Technology Exhibition Closes
articles.content:
15th National Invention and New Technology Exhibition Closes
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- There closed the 15th national invention and new technology exhibition that opened on July 18.
					 On show at the exhibition were inventions made in the efforts to make the national economy more independent and Juche-based and realize the integration of science and technology and production. The experience gained in the course was exchanged.
					
					 20 units including the Ministry of Electric Power Industry, the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, the Education Commission, the State Academy of Sciences and the Ministry of Light Industry won a high appreciation there.
					
					 More than 80 persons were awarded gold medals and inventor medals and certificates from the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO).
					
					 Present at its closing ceremony, held at the Sci-Tech Complex Friday, were Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, and officials concerned and scientists, technicians and inventors.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Closes
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Closes
Nampho, July 28 (KCNA) -- The National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup closed with due ceremony at the Nampho Gymnasium Friday. The tournament was opened on July 21.
					 Men of the South Phyongan Provincial Taekwon-Do Team and women of the Central Physical Training College took the first place in sparring matches held without weight distinction. The North Phyongan Provincial Taekwon-do Team (men) and the Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do Team (women) won the team sparring matches. Men of the Pyongyang City and South Phyongan and Jagang Provincal Taekwon-Do Teams and women of the Central Physical Training College and the Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do Team came first in individual sparring games according to different weight categories.
					
					 In the Paduk games, men and women players from the team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee placed first in individual events and players of the South Hamgyong Provincial Taekwon-Do Team in the mixed double. The South Hamgyong Provincial Taekwon-Do Team also won in the team event.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hits out at U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Military Provocations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hits out at U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Military Provocations
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers are more desperately resorting to military provocations against the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 Citing facts to prove this, the article notes that the U.S. is putting the maximum military pressure on the DPRK, while faulting its ICBM test, the exercise of its full-fledged right to self-defence, as an "intolerable provocation" and "fresh escalation of threat".
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' reckless hysteria for invasion of the DPRK has created such acute situation on the Korean peninsula that a war may break out any moment, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have gone mad in military provocations against the DPRK in collusion with their American master, claiming the present U.S. administration's DPRK policy characterized by "maximum pressure and engagement" has something in common with theirs.
					
					 It is only outsiders who will benefit from confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are getting keen on escalating military confrontation targeting the fellow countrymen while serving their master, being played into the trick of the U.S. trying to maintain the north-south stand-off and provoke a nuclear war against the north. This amounts to an act of hideous treachery hurting the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities' military provocations remind one of the crime committed by the puppet conservative group which escalated confrontation between fellow countrymen and lynched the north-south ties. 
					
					 It is a lesson of history that the traitors who are keen on sycophancy toward the U.S. and escalation of stand-off between the fellow countrymen, going against the trend of the times and desire of the nation, are bound to meet a shameful ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails U.S. for Persisting in Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails U.S. for Persisting in Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is building up a world opinion that the DPRK's successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasoong-14 poses a "threat to the world," a pretext for cooking up a "resolution on the toughest sanctions" at the UNSC, Rodong Sinmun says in a commentary Friday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It was the U.S. long-standing hostile policy toward the DPRK that compelled it to test-fire an intercontinental ballistic rocket.
					
					 The U.S. has enforced the policy hostile toward the DPRK, regarding it as an enemy since it occupied south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged in its ambition to stifle the DPRK and make the Korean peninsula a bridgehead for carrying out the strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The DPRK has bolstered up its nuclear deterrent to cope with the moves of the U.S. for aggression and its nuclear threats and blackmail escalating day by day.
					
					 The sophism that the DPRK's test-launch of ICBM poses a "threat to the world" reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 It is the most vicious gangster-like act for the U.S., the most heinous nuclear criminal and poser of nuclear threat, to say this or that about a threat as a permanent member of the UNSC.
					
					 It is as foolish an act as digging its own grave with its own hands that the U.S. is persisting with the sanctions and pressure on the DPRK, not properly understanding the highest strategic position of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to ponder over the declaration of the DPRK that if another "sanctions resolution" is fabricated at the UNSC, the DPRK would take the follow-up measures and react to it with just actions.

articles.title: DPRK's Tradition of Victory Will Last Forever: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Tradition of Victory Will Last Forever: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article that the successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 in July that stunned the world goes to prove the ever-lasting tradition of victory of Juche Korea, the U.S. tradition of unavoidable defeat and inevitability of final victory of the great Paektusan nation.
					 The article says that the victory of the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the Fatherland Liberation War was the proud one in which they inflicted a shameful defeat upon the U.S. imperialists with the Juche-oriented war methods true to the outstanding military idea and strategy of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Any U.S. military offensive could not check its defeat owing to the Juche-oriented war methods.
					
					 The DPRK's successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 eloquently proved once again the truth of history in which the war ignited by the enemy on June 25 is certainly followed by the war victory on July 27. 
					
					 If the empire of America challenges the revolutionary powerful Paektusan army possessed of the invincible Juche-oriented tactics and inexhaustible nuclear deterrence, it can never escape its final ruin. This means a "package of gifts" sent by the DPRK to the U.S. on the latter's "Independence Day".
					
					 The DPRK's ICBM aims at the U.S. heartland.
					
					 There is a clear option for the U.S.
					
					 There is no other way for the U.S. than radically uprooting its hostile policy towards the DPRK and nuclear threat to it.
					
					 The final victory is in store for the heroic Korean people who won war victory on July 27.

articles.title: Americans Say No to THAAD Deployment and U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Americans Say No to THAAD Deployment and U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean Yonhap News, a delegation of Americans for peace against THAAD deployment held a press conference in Seoul on July 25 urging the U.S. administration and south Korean authorities to stop their THAAD deployment in south Korea and their joint military drills.
					 Speakers denounced that the enforcement of THAAD deployment is part of the U.S. administration's moves for militarism.
					
					 Read out at the conference was a statement signed by more than 80 organizations and 280 personages of the U.S.
					
					 The statement stressed that in order to settle the "nuclear issue in the north", THAAD should not be deployed and the U.S. should halt its joint military drills with south Korea and arms race.

articles.title: S. Korean Farmers Claim Damages
articles.content:
S. Korean Farmers Claim Damages
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations held a rally near Chongwadae on July 24 urging the regime to take a step for helping the farmers who suffered from natural disaster.
					 Attending the rally were farmers of North Kyongsang Province who suffered from hailstorm late in May.
					
					 Deploring their plight of being unable to do farming due to the natural disaster while suffering losses from the opening of rice market caused by the unequal FTA with the U.S., the speakers urged the regime to pay damages.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Authorities Declare Sexual Slavery "Agreement" Null and Void
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Authorities Declare Sexual Slavery "Agreement" Null and Void
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held a Wednesday meeting in front of the Japanese Embassy in Seoul on July 26, demanding that the present authorities declare the humiliating "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army with Japan null and void.
					 The participants in the meeting honored the memory of the late victim of the sexual slavery.
					
					 The speakers could not suppress their anger as she died without venting her spite.
					
					 They demanded the present chief executive declare the "agreement" null and void.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised in Different Countries, Regions
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised in Different Countries, Regions
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and internet homepages in different countries and regions devoted special write-ups on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The July issue of the German newspaper Rote Fahne carried an article illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President. The article said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was the founder of socialist Korea.
					
					 His career was the one devoted to building and strengthening socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The feats he performed by constructing socialism centered on the popular masses, indicating the genuine road of building new society to the progressives and inspiring them with hope, confidence and courage will shine long. 
					
					 The internet homepages of the Tanzanian newspaper Uhuru, the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association carried articles titled "Immortal exploits, peerlessly great man", "Sun of mankind, father of all people", "Remembering the great man", etc, accompanied with the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and his photos from July 5 to 8.
					
					 The websites of the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture, the France-Korea Friendship Association, the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Spain, the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria posted articles titled "Outstanding leader in 20th century", "With the belief in the people as in Heaven", "Peerlessly great man" from June 29 to July 8.
					
					 The articles said that humankind's reverence for the President is growing deeper with each passing day and praised him as a brilliant thinker and theoretician who left the most vivid mark in the history of human thought, an extraordinary strategist who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and an elder statesman in the 20th century.

articles.title: DPRK Will Always Win Victory: Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK Will Always Win Victory: Swiss Bodies
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on July 16 with the approach of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 It said that the army and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S. imperialists and won a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The arrogant aggressors U.S. imperialists, which boasted that it had not suffered a single defeat in its history of aggressive wars, knelt down to the people of the DPRK, not a big country, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The amazing and historic victory which jolted the world showed in practice that even a small country is able to defeat any formidable enemies when it is wisely led by a great leader and all the people unite close around him.
					
					 No war has broken out on the Korean peninsula for over six decades after the war. This is the brilliant fruition of the leadership of the Songun revolution by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The position of the DPRK which has H-bomb and ICBM is warning the Trump administration against the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by an attack on the country.
					
					 Juche Korea, Songun Korea will always win victory.

articles.title: Pakistani Paper on Secret of DPRK's Victory
articles.content:
Pakistani Paper on Secret of DPRK's Victory
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Pakistani paper Election Times carried an article titled "DPRK's tradition of victory and its secret" on July 14 with the approach of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The paper said:
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea in the East is a mysterious country.
					
					 This country is becoming stronger, winning victory after victory, in defiance of the extreme sanctions and blockade by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, manifold ordeals and unprecedented natural disasters.
					
					 In order to know the secret, it is necessary to recall the history of the struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 Noting that the tradition of proud victories of the DPRK was established and had been successfully carried forward by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the paper went on:
					
					 The DPRK has ceaselessly won victories through generations and its steady victory became a law.
					
					 Then, where is the secret of the victory of the DPRK?
					
					 Firstly, it is the leadership of the prominent leader.
					
					 Secondly, it is the strength of the people.
					
					 The leadership of the prominent leader plus the strength of the people is able to do anything.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Cementerio de Martires de Guerra de Liberacion de Patria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Cementerio de Martires de Guerra de Liberacion de Patria
Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 64 de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un visito el dia 27 el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, donde rindio homenaje a los martires del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Myong Su, Pak Yong Sik y otros comandantes del EPC y los demas de las unidades de tipo de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpos.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente llego al Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Fue colocada una ofrenda floral en nombre del Maximo Dirigente.
					
					El Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un guardo un momento de silencio junto con sus acompanantes en memoria de los martires del EPC y recorrio el cementerio.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los militantes del partido, los trabajadores y los miembros de la nueva generacion guardaran y sucederan generacion tras generacion como la mas preciosa riqueza ideo-espiritual el noble espiritu de la defensa a la patria y el heroismo masivo de los soldados heroicos de la decada de 1950 en la lucha por la prosperidad de la patria y por la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo dedicado por Organizacion Infantil Baath de Siria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo dedicado por Organizacion Infantil Baath de Siria
Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le enviara la Organizacion Infantil Baath de Siria.
					El regalo fue entregado el dia 28 a un funcionario coreano por el director del Departamento de Tecnologia, Informacion y Relaciones Exteriores, Waddah Sawas, quien encabeza la delegacion de la entidad infantil, de visita en Corea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam visitara pronto a Iran
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam visitara pronto a Iran
Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, visitara pronto a Iran para participar en la ceremonia de toma de posesion del Presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran, cumplimentando la invitacion del gobierno de este pais.

articles.title: Vocero de cancilleria coreana condena el disparate de informadora especial relativa a situacion de DDHH de Myanmar
articles.content:
Vocero de cancilleria coreana condena el disparate de informadora especial relativa a situacion de DDHH de Myanmar
Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que en los ultimos dias la informadora especial referente a la situacion de los derechos humanos de Myanmar del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU censuro al gobierno de Myanmar poniendose al lado de EE.UU., el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 28 la siguiente respuesta:
					Recientemente, al actuar en union con las maniobras de sancion y presion anti-Myanmar de EE.UU la informadora especial referente a la situacion de DDHH de Myanmar de Consejo de DDHH de la ONU multiplica mas la presion a este pais asiatico politizando el asunto de DDHH de la raza de Rohingya que vive en el estado de Rakhine de Myanmar.
					
					En la entrevista de prensa sostenida el dia 21 pasado despues de su visita a Myanmar, la informante critico injustamente la situacion de DDHH de Rohingya sin hablar nada de las medidas positivas tomadas por el gobierno de Myanmar.
					
					Esto provoca la resistencia debida del gobierno de Myanmar porque su acto se coincide en el tiempo con que el representante norteamericano en la ONU intervino abiertamente el dia 11 en los asuntos internos de Myanmar diciendo que es imposible estar con brazos cruzados ante la situacion de Myanmar y el gobierno de Myanmar debe aceptar la delegacion de investigacion del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU. 
					
					Estas palabras de la informadora especial muestran que ella viola los principios de la justicia y de la no intervencion en los asuntos internos en el problema de los DDHH y se adhiere a las maniobras de EE.UU. que se intervine en los asuntos internos de otros paises bajo el pretexto de la "defensa de los derechos humanos". 
					
					Este caso demuestra bien que es inutil el regimen del informador especial relativo a la situacion de los derechos humanos que suele a intervenir en los asuntos internos de los Estados determinados segun el mando de EE.UU. y que las organizaciones internacionales de derechos humanos actuan como titeres de EE.UU.
					
					Estas organizaciones no deben adherirse a las maniobras malsanas de EE.UU, que bajo la mascara del "juez de DDHH" trata de presionar a los paises independientes, sino respetar la soberania y los intereses de los Estados soberanos y esforzarse por realizar la verdadera justicia internacional.
					
					El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea rechaza rotundamente la intervencion del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU y otras organizaciones internacionales de DDHH y apoyara activamente a la justa causa del gobierno y pueblo de Myanmar para construir un pacifico Estado federal democratico.

Jon Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion de Organizacion Infantil Baath de Siria

articles.title: RPDC obtiene 7 medallas de oro y 2 de plata mas en el campeonato asiatico
articles.content:
RPDC obtiene 7 medallas de oro y 2 de plata mas en el campeonato asiatico
Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- Los pesistas coreanos amplian exitos en el Campeonato Asiatico de Levantamiento de Pesas de Jovenes y Juniores 2017 que transcurre en Katmandu de Nepal.
					En la division de 58kg de la categoria juvenil (F), Kang Hyon Gyong conquisto 3 medallas de oro el dia 25.
					
					Al dia siguiente, sus colegas se llevaron 7 preseas de oro y 2 de plata en distintas divisiones de peso.
					
					Song Kuk Hyang compitio en la division de 63kg de ambas categorias, o sea, la junior y la juvenil (F).
					
					En las dos categorias, ella ocupo el primer lugar en el arranque y el total y el segundo en el envion y conquisto asi 4 medallas de oro y 2 de plata.
					
					Al medallero de la RPDC suman otras 3 de oro conquistadas por el muchacho Pak Jong Ju quien se corono campeon en el peso de 69kg de la categoria juvenil con un total de 312kg al levantar 138kg en el estilo arranque y el 174kg en envion.
